scripts.clean: pnpm clean:node && pnpm clean:wrangler && pnpm clean:etc
scripts.refs:shadcn: rm -rf refs/shadcn && mkdir -p refs/shadcn && curl -L https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui/archive/refs/tags/shadcn-ui@0.9.4.tar.gz | tar -xz -C refs/shadcn --strip-components=1
scripts.refs:tan-router: rm -rf refs/tan-router && mkdir -p refs/tan-router && curl -L https://github.com/TanStack/router/archive/refs/tags/v1.141.2.tar.gz | tar -xz -C refs/tan-router --strip-components=1
scripts.refs:tan-start: rm -rf refs/tan-start && mkdir -p refs/tan-start && curl -L https://github.com/TanStack/router/archive/refs/tags/v1.141.3.tar.gz | tar -xz -C refs/tan-start --strip-components=1
scripts.refs:tan-form: rm -rf refs/tan-form && mkdir -p refs/tan-form && curl -L https://github.com/TanStack/form/archive/refs/tags/@tanstack/react-form@1.27.4.tar.gz | tar -xz -C refs/tan-form --strip-components=1
scripts.refs:tan-query: rm -rf refs/tan-query && mkdir -p refs/tan-query && curl -L https://github.com/TanStack/query/archive/refs/tags/@tanstack/react-query@5.90.12.tar.gz | tar -xz -C refs/tan-query --strip-components=1
scripts.refs:base-ui: rm -rf refs/base-ui && mkdir -p refs/base-ui && curl -L https://github.com/mui/base-ui/archive/refs/tags/v1.0.0.tar.gz | tar -xz -C refs/base-ui --strip-components=1
